author: stsp
msg: * configure.ac: Destroy the cached result before invoking AC_SEARCH_LIBS
for bindtextdomain() a second time. Also, set enable_nls to "yes"
if the check succeeded so that ENABLE_NLS ends up being set, too.
This time, the fix has been properly tested on the live patient

author: stsp
msg: Undo r38571, which in turn reverted r37827.
Arfrever has pointed out a way to fix r37827.

author: stsp
msg: Fix a segfault introduced by r38580 which broke copy test 66.
(do_commit_item): When doing a WC->URL copy with --parents, intermediate
parents are created as commit items with their path field set to NULL.

author: arfrever
msg: * build/transform_libtool_scripts.sh: Find tests only with depth=2 to improve
